verses.verse: Maschil <WH4905> of David <WH1732>; A Prayer <WH8605> when he was in the cave <WH4631>. I cried <WH2199> unto the LORD <WH3068> with my voice <WH6963>; with my voice <WH6963> unto the LORD <WH3068> did I make my supplication <WH2603>.
I poured out <WH8210> my complaint <WH7879> before <WH6440> him; I shewed <WH5046> before <WH6440> him my trouble <WH6869>.

When my spirit <WH7307> was overwhelmed <WH5848> within me, then thou knewest <WH3045> my path <WH5410>. In the way <WH734> wherein <WH2098> I walked <WH1980> have they privily laid <WH2934> a snare <WH6341> for me.
I looked <WH5027> on my right hand <WH3225>, and beheld <WH7200>, but there was no man that would know <WH5234> me: refuge <WH4498> failed <WH6> me; no man cared <WH1875> for my soul <WH5315>.
I cried <WH2199> unto thee, O LORD <WH3068>: I said <WH559>, Thou art my refuge <WH4268> and my portion <WH2506> in the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>.
Attend <WH7181> unto my cry <WH7440>; for I am brought <WH1809> very <WH3966> low <WH1809>: deliver <WH5337> me from my persecutors <WH7291>; for they are stronger <WH553> than I.

Bring <WH3318> my soul <WH5315> out of prison <WH4525>, that I may praise <WH3034> thy name <WH8034>: the righteous <WH6662> shall compass me about <WH3803>; for thou shalt deal bountifully <WH1580> with me.
